participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outdoorsy and passionate about vintage cars. Enjoys a laid-back lifestyle and has a strong connection with animals.
participant_1.background: i have two dogs. i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i own two vintage mustangs.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and a bit lazy, prefers to enjoy life rather than work hard. Has a unique perspective on relationships.
participant_2.background: i'm a bee farmer. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i am close to.
